fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 gained 38.30 points or 0.22% to settle at 17,398.05. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, slipped 2.70% to 12.59. Reliance Industries (RIL), ICICI Bank and Adani Enterprises were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The April 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 April 2023.
